name: Santa Rush (Lee Tran)
description:
This is a short little christmas platformer that was made for a tutorial series on youtube. You can view the videos here: How to make a Santa Platformer in Unity

How to play:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to Jump
  • Left CTRL or Left Click to Dash
  • Left ALT or Right Click to Butt Slam
